anonymous-survey-tooltip: Choose whether survey data should be collected anonymously or not
answer-slow-fast: Is the speed "Too Slow" or "Too Fast"?
maximum-num-attachments-message: You cannot upload more than six attachments per ticket.
meter-prompt: Please indicate your answer on below scale by dragging the orange bar
posted-to-queue: Someone posted a question on the queue
survey-not-started: The survey has not been started yet.
ticket-created-message:
Thank you very much for your report.
We will look into the problem and give you feedback as soon as possible.
You will receive an email, but you can also see the answer in the dashboard.
ticketing-intro: Here you can report a problem with the function of this lesson. Your message will be sent to both your instructors and the ISLE support team.
